Content.Title: This is CBeebies!
Content.Synopsis: CBeebies is the BBC channel for under sixes, encouraging children to learn through play. You can join in the fun every day from 6.00am to 7.00pm.

Content.Title: Tikkabilla
Content.Synopsis: Teddy Bears' Picnic: Teddy Bears' Picnic, opposites and Summerton Mill in the Tikkabilla house with Veejay, Simon and Tamba.

Content.Title: Birthdays
Content.Synopsis: Is your birthday card in today's colourful selection?

Content.Title: Teletubbies
Content.Synopsis: Feeding Sheep in Winter:The Teletubbies watch Sarah and Mark give their sheep a winter feed. In Teletubbyland, the Teletubbies cannot decide whether to have Tubby Custard or Tubby Toast. [S]

Content.Title: Boogie Beebies
Content.Synopsis: Barnyard Boogie: Join Nat and Pete down on the farm for the Barnyard Boogie.

Content.Title: The Roly Mo Show
Content.Synopsis: Dressing Up: Yugo and Migo as the ugly sisters, and Little Bo as the prince? Cinderella is the story, or should that be Cinderroly? [S]

Content.Title: Tweenies
Content.Synopsis: I'm Magic: Jake wants to be a real magician, so he tries to do some magic tricks without success. Max teaches him a magic trick and Milo, Fizz and Bella can't believe their eyes. [S]

Content.Title: Step Inside
Content.Synopsis: I Want a Cat: Mr Mopple is looking after a cat called Hazel, and he feeds her with a saucer of milk. The cat reminds Boris of a story about Jessie, a girl who desperately wants a cat. [S]

Content.Title: Balamory
Content.Synopsis: Pirate Party: It's Miss Hoolie's birthday, but everyone in Balamory seems to have forgotten. Or have they? [S]

Content.Title: Razzledazzle
Content.Synopsis: Farmer Louise: Razzledazzle discovers a meowing cow, enjoys a toy tea party, and learns why Farmer Louise has knicky-knocky knees. [S]

Content.Title: Come Outside
Content.Synopsis: Hedgehogs: Auntie Mabel and Pippin the dog explore the world around them. In this episode they search the garden for Spikey the hedgehog. [S]

Content.Title: Birthdays
Content.Synopsis: Is your birthday card in today's colourful selection?

Content.Title: The Roly Mo Show
Content.Synopsis: Dressing Up: Yugo and Migo as the ugly sisters, and Little Bo as the prince? Cinderella is the story, or should that be Cinderroly? [S]

Content.Title: Tweenies
Content.Synopsis: Magic Magnets: When Milo moves a metal washer without touching it you might think it was magic... or was it a magnet? The Tweenies race each other on their magic magnet racetracks. [S]

Content.Title: Big Cook Little Cook
Content.Synopsis: Ballerina: Small is busy cleaning while Ben sleeps. Just then, Selina Marina the prima ballerina comes into the cafe. Ben and Small make her a berry ballerina, what will Selina leave in return? [S]

Content.Title: The Shiny Show
Content.Synopsis: Magician: Dogsby the dog, Mukka the monkey and Tigs the tiger play their very own quiz game. In this episode, the gang sees a magician performing tricks and tries out some magic. [S]

Content.Title: Clifford's Puppy Days
Content.Synopsis: Clifford's Winter Spirit: It's the first snowfall of winter and everyone seems to have a tradition to mark the occasion, except Norville. [S]

Content.Title: Clifford's Puppy Days
Content.Synopsis: Tell Me a Tale: Shun tells a traditional Japanese story. [S]

Content.Title: SMarteenies
Content.Synopsis: Mark Speight, Kirsten O'Brien, Jay Burridge, Bizi Lizi and Doogy the dog with inspiring art ideas, including the Man of Letters, finger painting pictures and more from the Shape Store. [S]

Content.Title: Boogie Beebies
Content.Synopsis: Shoe Hoe Down: Put on your boogie shoes and join Nat and Pete in The Shoe Hoe Down. [S]

Content.Title: Balamory
Content.Synopsis: Dressing Up Day: It's dressing up day! Archie, Miss Hoolie and the children are really looking forward to it. But will PC Plum dress up as a policeman again? [AD,S]

Content.Title: Little Robots
Content.Synopsis: Sparkle Day: It's Sparkle Day, a very important day in the Little Robots' calendar. [S]

Content.Title: Tweenies
Content.Synopsis: Penguin Power: Milo wins a penguin suit. He puts it on but realises that he doesn't know what penguins do, so Max shows the Tweenies a video of penguins. [S]

Content.Title: Bobinogs
Content.Synopsis: Night and Day: The Bobinogs learn about different times: meal times, times of the day, morning, bedtime, yesterday, today and tomorrow. [S]

Content.Title: Tweenies
Content.Synopsis: Magic Magnets: When Milo moves a metal washer without touching it you might think it was magic... or was it a magnet? The Tweenies race each other on their magic magnet racetracks. [S,SL]

Content.Title: Big Cook Little Cook
Content.Synopsis: Ballerina: Small is busy cleaning while Ben sleeps. Just then, Selina Marina the prima ballerina comes into the cafe. Ben and Small make her a berry ballerina, what will Selina leave in return? [S,SL]

Content.Title: The Shiny Show
Content.Synopsis: Magician: Dogsby the dog, Mukka the monkey and Tigs the tiger play their very own quiz game. In this episode, the gang sees a magician performing tricks and tries out some magic. [S,SL]

Content.Title: Clifford's Puppy Days
Content.Synopsis: Clifford's Winter Spirit: It's the first snowfall of winter and everyone seems to have a tradition to mark the occasion, except Norville. [S,SL]

Content.Title: Clifford's Puppy Days
Content.Synopsis: Tell Me a Tale: Shun tells a traditional Japanese story. [S,SL]

Content.Title: SMarteenies
Content.Synopsis: Mark Speight, Kirsten O'Brien, Jay Burridge, Bizi Lizi and Doogy the dog with inspiring art ideas, including the Man of Letters, finger painting pictures and more from the Shape Store. [S,SL]

Content.Title: Boogie Beebies
Content.Synopsis: Shoe Hoe Down: Put on your boogie shoes and join Nat and Pete in The Shoe Hoe Down. [S,SL]

Content.Title: Wide Eye
Content.Synopsis: CBeebies Bedtime Hour. A Snowy Owl: The Natterjack forest is covered in a blanket of snow, but not everyone is happy about it. [S]

Content.Title: Fimbles
Content.Synopsis: CBeebies Bedtime Hour. Pop Up Book: The Fimbles find a pop up book, which tells a very familiar story. [AD,S] Then the story, A Perfect Day for It, read by Lenny Henry.

Content.Title: Story Makers
Content.Synopsis: CBeebies Bedtime Hour. Balloons: Someone's left some beautiful balloons in the library. [AD,S]
